name: who_gho_get_data
description: Retrieve health data from WHO GHO for a specific indicator. Supports filtering by country, year, and other dimensions. Returns actual health statistics and measurements.

country_code.description: ISO 3-letter country code (e.g., 'USA', 'GBR', 'CHN'). Optional, returns all countries if not specified.

year.description: Year to filter data (e.g., 2020). Optional, returns all years if not specified.

top.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 100, max: 1000)

skip.description: Number of results to skip for pagination (default: 0)

name: who_gho_query_health_data
description: Answer generic health questions using natural language queries. Automatically searches for relevant indicators, retrieves health data, and returns formatted answers with actual values. Example: 'smoking rate in USA 2020' returns the actual smoking percentage.

query.description: Natural language query (e.g., 'smoking rate in USA', 'diabetes prevalence in China 2020')

country_code.description: ISO 3-letter country code (e.g., 'USA', 'GBR'). Optional, will be extracted from query if not provided.

year.description: Year for data (e.g., 2020). Optional, will be extracted from query if not provided.

top.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)
